alert.note: Alert for Bent; Kiowa (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 27 at 4:26PM MDT until May 27 at 4:45PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM MDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL KIOWA AND NORTHEASTERN BENT COUNTIES... At 426 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles northwest of Hasty, or 24 miles west of Lamar, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... John Martin Reservoir. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
